source_objects.title: Human Resources
source_objects.description: Learn human resources with courses ranging from oracle human capital management to attracting, hiring and retaining the best people.

items.title: Onboarding New Employees: Increase retention and performance

visible_instructors.name: PracticalGrowth
visible_instructors.title: PracticalGrowth
visible_instructors.job_title: Practical, applicable courses for career growth

items.headline: Learn how to optimize your onboarding process to enable new hires to be productive and efficient as soon as they start
objectives_summary: Why onboarding is such an important function within your business
Creating an onboarding checklist to organize and track progress during the onboarding process
Onboarding lessons you can apply from different industries

items.title: Understanding Performance Management as an HR Professional

visible_instructors.name: Christina A.
visible_instructors.title: Christina A. Danforth
visible_instructors.job_title: Certified Sr Professional in Human Resources

items.headline: This course is designed for human resources professionals or those who wish to learn more about performance management.
objectives_summary: Define and explain the purpose of Performance Management, especially to managers
Identify the characteristics and key components of an effective Performance Management process
Explain the various methods used for performance evaluation

items.title: HR 101: Compliance Made Easy  -  U.S. Employers Must Have

visible_instructors.name: Donna
visible_instructors.title: Donna Galatas
visible_instructors.job_title: HR Vice Empress / CEO of The Galatas Group

visible_instructors.name: Jackie
visible_instructors.title: Jackie Torres
visible_instructors.job_title: Vice Empress & COO of The Galatas Group

items.headline: Streamline the most critical human resource (HR) processes and be in compliance with U.S. employment regulations
objectives_summary: Set up and manage employee related records so it's easy to find documents
Complete the I-9 Form for all new hires the right way so you don't have to worry about passing an I-9 audit
Audit existing I-9 Forms and make corrections the right way so if you are audited everything is ready and organized

items.title: International Business Etiquette

visible_instructors.name: Kimberly
visible_instructors.title: Kimberly Law
visible_instructors.job_title: AICI CIP,  Certified Image & Etiquette Expert

items.headline: Soft Skills you need to excel at work!
objectives_summary: Soft skills needed to interact effectively in a business setting
Show respect to co-workers and clients
Make a great impression at a job interview

items.title: Effective Human Resource Administration
items.headline: Effective Human Resource Administration
objectives_summary: Learn the basics of effective human resource administration
Understand the fundamentals of motivation
Develop strong interpersonal and intergroup skills in employees and groups through training

items.title: Employment Law Compliance Made Easy
items.headline: A comprehensive course for management to understand key employment law issues in the workplace.
objectives_summary: Understand major employment law implications in the workplace.
Recognize employment relation situations that create legal liability for businesses.
Learn to identify wage-related issues and manage resulting employee issues proactively.

items.title: 7 steps to effective Performance Management Conversations
items.headline: Motivate, energise and inspire your people to perform at their best and get results
objectives_summary: Be clear about the purpose for your conversation
Know how to set your conversation up to succeed
Understand the difference between corrective and amplifying feedback

items.title: Workplace Communication: Effectively Deliver Criticism
items.headline: Constructive feedback can be the key to positive growth for your colleagues and workplace culture
objectives_summary: Deliver criticism in the workplace
Coach colleagues to improve their performance
Critique employees to advance their skills

items.title: Women's Leadership Masterclass
items.headline: Based on the best seller "How Women Rise: Break the Habits Holding Your Career Back"
objectives_summary: Enable you at all stages of your career reach new heights and aid you in your quest to advance and successfully take on new challenges in the workplace, your community, and the world.
Be a better worker, colleague, boss, employee, manager and person.

items.title: HR - Agile HR Fundamentals ( Human Resources )

visible_instructors.name: Culturelligence
visible_instructors.title: Culturelligence LLC
visible_instructors.job_title: Redefining values and culture, the agile way

items.headline: Human Resources - Paradigm Shift | Agile Movement in Human Resources | HR Courses | HR Certification
objectives_summary: Learn what is Agile and why it is the need of the hour
Understand what is Conventional HR
Understand the Paradigm Shift from Traditional HR to Agile HR

items.title: Managing mental health issues in the workplace
items.headline: Learn how to support your own mental health and wellbeing and that of your staff
objectives_summary: understand the risks posed by mental ill health and the costs to employers
appreciate the importance of good mental health practice in the workplace
recognise the need to tackle the stigma around mental health

items.title: Identifying and Building Digital Leadership Talent
items.headline: Learn to identify and develop cross organizational - high performance digital business strategy and transformation teams
objectives_summary: Identify, organize, task, and develop the digital leaders your company needs to define and implement a successful digital strategy and transformation

items.title: Introduction to Hiring and Recruiting Strategy
items.headline: Design a Fair, Effective, and Clear Process to Source, Screen, and Select the Best People for Your Team
objectives_summary: Understand how to scope a compelling and accurate job description
Develop a strategy to source promising candidates
Outline a screening and selection process to identify the right candidates

items.title: Start & Grow Your Staffing & Recruiting Business in 2021

visible_instructors.name: Ryan
visible_instructors.title: Ryan Lecour
visible_instructors.job_title: Automation, Lead Generation, Marketing & Sales Expert

items.headline: The Step-by-Step Blueprint I Used to Build & Sell My 7 Figure Agency
objectives_summary: Tap into the strategies, resources, tools & processes for creating $1.5M revenue in 7 months as a staffingpreneur.

items.title: Conduct Behavioral Interviews & Be a Great Mentor
items.headline: Learn how to hire and mentor the best. Learn what it takes to conduct interviews and foster mentee relationships.
objectives_summary: Hire the best talent for your team
Understand the behavior interview process and utilize it
Impact a co-worker’s career and your organization’s performance by becoming a mentor

items.title: Instructional Design for Classroom Training
items.headline: Learn how to design effective and engaging in-class and in-house training sessions and learning experiences from scratch
objectives_summary: Recognise the most popular types of classroom training and learning opportunities available to organizations
Perform key types of analysis to determine a need for a training
Recognise different preferences to learning and demonstrate how those can be applied to a classroom training
